title: ID help, please
content:
I think I just sent an instant message and have no idea what this is about … when I logged in, I went to my profile and clicked ‘go’ from there =instant message (of my profile! ?) Please excuse me if you received my no-content/message :)

Anyway, here I am, hoping you will be able to help me identify the attached font.

Thanks!  
Linda

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [blacks-logo2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=blacks-logo2_0.jpg) | 1.7 KB |
author: link

comments.content:
Linda, can you upload a sample of the typeface you want us to identify, or direct us to an online showing? Thank you. We’ll try to help you out the best we can. :)

Oh, and please make sure to read the Frequently Asked Questions at the top of the topics list.

You know, I actually did attach my sample … when I didn’t see it, I checked ‘edit’ and saw the link to the sample! I just ‘attached’ it again … and now I see it :) Sorry, must be the new format or something that I have to get used to :)
Thanks so much Patty & Mike, aka Houdini
Gotta thank Mike Yanega too - I found this in his [Script ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001052/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptIDGuide.html).
Thanks for the mention Patty. I finally got back into the Board, thanks to assists from Yves & Joe. It’s good to be back.
